name: Undead Ascension
description:
Undead Ascension is a challenging, modern, arcade-like type of game. It puts your skills and decision making to the test! Take on the challenge that even our developers have a hard time completing!

Assist Atlas in his quest of loyalty to his king! Whether his father knows of his consequences is not of concern to him. The only thing that is is his loyalty, or is it? Maybe Atlas can see what's wrong from right. Maybe he knows the outcome of his actions...

Use a range of weapons and armors from forks to mythic blades to defeat your enemies and advance father into the keep! Pick from a range of abilities and customize Atlas to how you see fit or possibly...how you see to win.

Includes Full Xbox 360 Controller Support!

Music featuring Waterflame!

Contact us at:

http://starbreakergames.webs.com
